alert.note: Alert for Clay (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 06 at 8:20PM CDT until May 06 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Clay County in northern Texas... * Until 900 PM CDT. * At 820 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bellevue, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bellevue, Newport, and Vashti. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
